about_the_game:
Roguelike Deckbuilding

  • Loot epic Items or Fine-tune your Build at the Trainers and Shopkeepers with their balanced Buy/Sell-system.

  • Load your Backpack with Action-Items and Equip Relics/Gear to add extra Effects.

Grid-based Tactics & Telegraphed Attacks.

  • Traditional Turn-based Tactics Movement/Prepare/Attack-system + The additional use of your Backpack-Items.

  • Control your Hero and Companion, maybe get some extra Muscle.

  • Use Crowd-Control effects such as Flip, Pin, Push, Pull, Provoke or Place/Manipulate surrounding Traps/Objects/Terrain to dominate the Battle-Grid.

  • Enemies Telegraphed Attacks preview their intended Actions and Attack-Order. Careful position yourself and setup Ambushes, or just Nuke them with your Game-breaking Combos.

  • Elites and Bosses may also have Relics/Gear and use Action-Items from their Backpacks.

  • Made a mistake? Have a Berry and Rewind your Turn!

  • Satisfying Fast-paced Turn Handling and QoL Features.

Endless Replayability & Difficulty

  • Dive Deeper into the Dungeon or Return to Town? Complete more Quests, Hunt that Boss, Collect its Bounty or Replenish your Items and Tweak your Build.

  • Proc-gen + Handcrafted Quest/Level-design as part of an overarching Event-system.

  • Permadeath & Endless Mode.

  • Meta Progression: Unlock 30+ Companions by completing Achievements.

Save the Town from impending Doom, Explore the Lands & Meet the Master!

short_description: A turn-based tactical roguelike with deck-building elements on a grid. Create insane synergies, make use of enemies telegraphed attacks and line up your combos to dominate the area. Fight bosses and their backpacks, loot dungeons, complete quests, save the town and Meet the Master!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
